definitions.definition: A hanging down of the head; a drooping posture; a limp appearance
definitions.example: He sat with an unenthusiastic slouch.

definitions.definition: Any depression or hanging down, as of a hat brim.
definitions.example: The plant hung in a permanent slouch.

definitions.definition: Someone who is slow to act.
To hang or droop; to adopt a limp posture
definitions.example: Do not slouch when playing a flute.

definitions.definition: To walk in a clumsy, lazy manner.
definitions.example: I slouched to the fridge to see if there was anything to eat.

definitions.definition: To cause to hang down or droop; to depress.
